rows.label: tev032801_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: tev032801_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Adappin about the Ma-non's time in Oblivia.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev032801_JNK0020
rows.name: Discuss

rows.label: tev032801_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Adappin if anything is troubling him.

rows.label: tev032801_SEL0031
rows.name: Ask Adappin what things were like during the attack.

rows.label: tev032801_SEL0051
rows.name: Ask Adappin about the Wrothians.

rows.label: tev032801_SEL0061
rows.name: Ask Adappin about recent developments.

rows.label: tev032801_SEL1011
rows.name: Ask Adappin about life in New LA.

rows.label: tev032801_SEL1021
rows.name: Ask Adappin if anything is troubling him.

rows.label: tev032801_MSG0001
rows.name:
We had to hide down in the canyon for a very long
time, you see? And we only had so much food, so...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev032801_MSG0002
rows.name:
Anyway, once that started to run out, we started to
worry that we might actually starve, you know?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev032801_MSG0003
rows.name:
Do you appreciate how you saved our hides by bailing
us out of there? Now we get to eat pizza and
pancakes and all of your weird, yummy foods![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev032801_MSG0004
rows.name: We'll never go hungry again, will we?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev032801_MSG0010
rows.name:
You know about the Ma-non who didn't pay for his
pizza that one time, don't you?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev032801_MSG0011
rows.name:
Well, the pizza-shop owner marched right up to me
and said, "I've got a bone to pick with you! Take me
to your leader!" ...Which is odd, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev032801_MSG0012
rows.name:
Because we don't really...have a leader?
All Ma-non have basically equal standing, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev032801_MSG0013
rows.name:
Those three "representatives" you first made contact
with aren't leaders, per se? They just happened to be
outside the ship at the right time.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev032801_MSG0014
rows.name:
So when you ask to speak to the person in charge,
there isn't really much we can do about it, right?
It's one of those cultural-difference thingies.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev032801_MSG0020
rows.name:
As the Ganglion were closing in, I decided to order up
some pizzas. You know, in case we had to take cover
for a while?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev032801_MSG0021
rows.name:
But apparently everyone else had the same idea?
The pizza guy didn't know whose order to take
first...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev032801_MSG0022
rows.name:
As it turns out, the Ganglion arrived before we could
work it out and no one got any pizza. So sad, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev032801_MSG0023
rows.name:
As I sat with my woeful hunger, I started to wonder if
maybe we Ma-non need a leader after all?
Or at least a little organization, perhaps?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev032801_MSG0024
rows.name:
And actually, I was thinking that maybe I should be
the leader? I mean, who else but me could do a better
job of ensuring that I get my my pizzas first?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev032801_MSG0030
rows.name:
Now that we're all friends with the Wrothians,
I think I'd like to have a word with their leader.
Ga Jiarg, was it?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev032801_MSG0031
rows.name:
They say he's a born leader, don't they?
Admired by all his people and all that?
Just like me, I suppose...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev032801_MSG0032
rows.name:
Perhaps he and I should sit down and give each other
some pointers?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev032801_MSG0033
rows.name:
With his encouragement, I might even be able to show
everyone who's fit to to to lead the Ma-non ship, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev032801_MSG0038
rows.name:
You know that the Ma-non never really picked leaders
like the other xenoforms, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev032801_MSG0039
rows.name:
But if I become leader, I can make everyone do what
I want, can't I?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev032801_MSG0040
rows.name:
I could even make the city adopt a pizza-centric
worldview...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev032801_MSG0041
rows.name:
So I'm committed to becoming the first Ma-non
president! President Adappin has a nice ring to to it,
wouldn't you agree?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev032801_MSG0042
rows.name:
When it comes time for me to run, don't forget to vote
Adappin, all right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev032801_MSG1001
rows.name:
Now everyone on the ship has to pay a Nopon tax
that only benefits the Nopon, you know?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev032801_MSG1002
rows.name:
That money could have been spent on more pizza,
don't you think? I know I can't afford as much as
I'd like these days...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev032801_MSG1003
rows.name:
I won't give in that easily, you know? Perhaps it's time
to overthrow this corrupt government and begin anew.
Revolution, right? Power to the people![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev032801_MSG1004
rows.name:
So if I don't win the next election, I suppose I'll be
taking up arms, right? The city of New LA will run red
with pizza sauce![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev032801_MSG1010
rows.name: I can finally say "no" now...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev032801_MSG1011
rows.name:
For a while there, all I could say was yes.
Bit of of a disaster, don't you think?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev032801_MSG1012
rows.name:
Oh, but I did keep saying yes to everything the
pizza guy recommended, which maybe wasn't quite
so so so bad?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev032801_MSG1013
rows.name:
Anyway, he got me to try a chocolate mayo
banana pizza, okay? And that was a DEFINITE yes!
You're drooling already, right? ...No? Really?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev032801_MSG2001
rows.name:
Since Sun'barac took leadership, we Ma-non now 
receive free pizza rations.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev032801_MSG2002
rows.name:
And I guess the Nopon are pretty happy as well,
since now they can get filthy rich working for the
provisional government?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev032801_MSG2003
rows.name:
I mean, I really would have liked to have won the
election, but I think Sun'barac was the right choice
in the end, you know?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev032801_MSG2004
rows.name:
I think I'm going to retire from politics and live out
my remaining days stuffing myself with pizza.
That's a good plan, yes? Yessss...[ST:wait ]
